abstract: United Nations report says dire situation in South Sudan worsened over 2015; conflict between government and rebel forces has resulted in widespread atrocities, including deliberate slaughter of children and rampant sexual abuse; 2.2 million people over past two years have fled fighting, which has disregarded traditional safe havens such as hospitals.
